overview: Solano is often plagued by nightmares in which, during the Middle Ages, he is pursued by the hunter Faro, who intends to kill him. On discovering, in an antiquarian, a tapestry that represents a hunt and that reminds him of his dream, he tries to buy it, but the owner refuses to sell it.

production_companies.name: Escola de Comunicações e Artes, Universidade de São Paulo

title: As Três Mortes de Solano
